verses.verse: In the <S%H7225>beginning<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1254>created<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> and the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

And the <S%H776>earth<s%> was <S%H8414>formless<s%> and <S%H922>void,<s%> and <S%H2822>darkness<s%> was <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H6440>surface<s%> of the <S%H8415>deep;<s%> and the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> was <S%H9550>moving<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H6440>surface<s%> of the <S%H4325>waters.<s%>
Then <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "Let there be <S%H216>light<s%>"; and there was <S%H216>light.<s%>
And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that the <S%H216>light<s%> was <S%H2896>good;<s%> and <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H914>separated<s%> the <S%H216>light<s%> from the <S%H2822>darkness.<s%>

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H216>light<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> and the <S%H2822>darkness<s%> He <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H3915>night.<s%> And there was <S%H6153>evening<s%> and there was <S%H1242>morning,<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

Then <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "Let there be an <S%H7549>expanse<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H4325>waters,<s%> and let it <S%H914>separate<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> from the <S%H4325>waters.<s%>"

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H7549>expanse,<s%> and <S%H914>separated<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> were <S%H4480>below<s%> <S%H8478><s%> the <S%H7549>expanse<s%> from the <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> were <S%H4480>above<s%> <S%H5921><s%> the <S%H7549>expanse;<s%> and it was <S%H3651>so.<s%>
And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H7549>expanse<s%> <S%H8064>heaven.<s%> And there was <S%H6153>evening<s%> and there was <S%H1242>morning,<s%> a <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

Then <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "Let the <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H4480>below<s%> <S%H8478><s%> the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> be <S%H9509>gathered<s%> into <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4725>place,<s%> and let the <S%H3004>dry<s%> <S%H3004>land<s%> <S%H7200>appear<s%>"; and it was <S%H3651>so.<s%>

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H3004>dry<s%> <S%H3004>land<s%> <S%H776>earth,<s%> and the <S%H9288>gathering<s%> of the <S%H4325>waters<s%> He <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H3220>seas;<s%> and <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that it was <S%H2896>good.<s%>

Then <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "Let the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H1876>sprout<s%> <S%H1877>vegetation,<s%> <S%H6212>plants<s%> <S%H2232>yielding<s%> <S%H2233>seed,<s%> [and] <S%H6529>fruit<s%> <S%H6086>trees<s%> <S%H6213>bearing<s%> <S%H6529>fruit<s%> after their <S%H4327>kind,<s%> with <S%H2233>seed<s%> in them, on the <S%H776>earth<s%>"; and it was <S%H3651>so.<s%>

And the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H3318>brought<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H1877>vegetation,<s%> <S%H6212>plants<s%> <S%H2232>yielding<s%> <S%H2233>seed<s%> after their <S%H4327>kind,<s%> and <S%H6086>trees<s%> <S%H6213>bearing<s%> <S%H6529>fruit,<s%> with <S%H2233>seed<s%> in them, after their <S%H4327>kind;<s%> and <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that it was <S%H2896>good.<s%>
And there was <S%H6153>evening<s%> and there was <S%H1242>morning,<s%> a <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

Then <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "Let there be <S%H3974>lights<s%> in the <S%H7549>expanse<s%> of the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> to <S%H914>separate<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> from the <S%H3915>night,<s%> and let them be for <S%H226>signs,<s%> and for <S%H4150>seasons,<s%> and for <S%H3117>days<s%> and <S%H8141>years;<s%>
and let them be for <S%H3974>lights<s%> in the <S%H7549>expanse<s%> of the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> to <S%H215>give<s%> <S%H215>light<s%> on the <S%H776>earth<s%> "; and it was <S%H3651>so.<s%>

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3974>lights,<s%> the <S%H1419>greater<s%> <S%H3974>light<s%> to <S%H4475>govern<s%> the <S%H3117>day,<s%> and the <S%H9512>lesser<s%> <S%H3974>light<s%> to <S%H4475>govern<s%> the <S%H3915>night;<s%> [He made] the <S%H3556>stars<s%> also.
And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>placed<s%> them in the <S%H7549>expanse<s%> of the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> to <S%H215>give<s%> <S%H215>light<s%> on the <S%H776>earth,<s%>

and to <S%H4910>govern<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> and the <S%H3915>night,<s%> and to <S%H914>separate<s%> the <S%H216>light<s%> from the <S%H2822>darkness;<s%> and <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that it was <S%H2896>good.<s%>
And there was <S%H6153>evening<s%> and there was <S%H1242>morning,<s%> a <S%H7243>fourth<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

Then <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "Let the <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H8317>teem<s%> with <S%H8318>swarms<s%> of <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H5315>creatures,<s%> and let <S%H5775>birds<s%> <S%H5774>fly<s%> <S%H5921>above<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> in the <S%H6440>open<s%> <S%H7549>expanse<s%> of the <S%H8064>heavens.<s%>"

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1254>created<s%> the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H8577>sea<s%> <S%H8577>monsters,<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H5315>creature<s%> that <S%H7430>moves,<s%> with <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H8317>swarmed<s%> after their <S%H4327>kind,<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H3671>winged<s%> <S%H5775>bird<s%> after its <S%H4327>kind;<s%> and <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that it was <S%H2896>good.<s%>

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1288>blessed<s%> them, <S%H559>saying,<s%> "Be <S%H6509>fruitful<s%> and <S%H7235>multiply,<s%> and <S%H4390>fill<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> in the <S%H3220>seas,<s%> and let <S%H5775>birds<s%> <S%H7235>multiply<s%> on the <S%H776>earth.<s%>"
And there was <S%H6153>evening<s%> and there was <S%H1242>morning,<s%> a <S%H2549>fifth<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

Then <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "Let the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H3318>bring<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H5315>creatures<s%> after their <S%H4327>kind:<s%> <S%H929>cattle<s%> and <S%H7431>creeping<s%> <S%H7431>things<s%> and <S%H9130>beasts<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> after their <S%H4327>kind<s%>"; and it was <S%H3651>so.<s%>

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H9130>beasts<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> after their <S%H4327>kind,<s%> and the <S%H929>cattle<s%> after their <S%H4327>kind,<s%> and <S%H3605>everything<s%> that <S%H7431>creeps<s%> on the <S%H127>ground<s%> after its <S%H4327>kind;<s%> and <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that it was <S%H2896>good.<s%>

Then <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "Let Us <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> in Our <S%H6754>image,<s%> according to Our <S%H1823>likeness;<s%> and let them <S%H7287>rule<s%> over the <S%H1710>fish<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%> and over the <S%H5775>birds<s%> of the <S%H8064>sky<s%> and over the <S%H929>cattle<s%> and over <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and over <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H7431>creeping<s%> <S%H7431>thing<s%> that <S%H7430>creeps<s%> on the <S%H776>earth.<s%>"

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1254>created<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> in His own <S%H6754>image,<s%> in the <S%H6754>image<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> He <S%H1254>created<s%> him; <S%H2145>male<s%> and <S%H5347>female<s%> He <S%H1254>created<s%> them.

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1288>blessed<s%> them; and <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to them, "Be <S%H6509>fruitful<s%> and <S%H7235>multiply,<s%> and <S%H4390>fill<s%> the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and <S%H3533>subdue<s%> it; and <S%H7287>rule<s%> over the <S%H1710>fish<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%> and over the <S%H5775>birds<s%> of the <S%H8064>sky,<s%> and over <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H2416>thing<s%> that <S%H7430>moves<s%> on the <S%H776>earth.<s%>"

Then <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> I have <S%H5414>given<s%> you <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H6212>plant<s%> <S%H2232>yielding<s%> <S%H2233>seed<s%> that is on the <S%H6440>surface<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H6086>tree<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> has <S%H6529>fruit<s%> <S%H2232>yielding<s%> <S%H2233>seed;<s%> it shall be <S%H402>food<s%> for you;

and to <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H9130>beast<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> and to <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H5775>bird<s%> of the <S%H8064>sky<s%> and to <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H3605>thing<s%> that <S%H7430>moves<s%> on the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> has <S%H5315>life,<s%> <S%H9130><s%> [I have given] <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H3418>green<s%> <S%H6212>plant<s%> for <S%H402>food<s%> "; and it was <S%H3651>so.<s%>

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that He had <S%H6213>made,<s%> and <S%H2009>behold,<s%> it was <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H2896>good.<s%> And there was <S%H6153>evening<s%> and there was <S%H1242>morning,<s%> the <S%H8345>sixth<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>
